job description:
Seeking a high-performing, detail-oriented, self-starter data scientist to develop predictive environmental features to enrich models for customer-facing business products.

The successful candidate will report to company's Placement Analytics team, whose effort is to optimize company's product recommendation to farmers, and support company's efforts in predictive and prescriptive agricultural analysis.

The position provides an opportunity to learn company's digital tools and recommendation platforms in the digital Ag industry
